title: 820-2936b It's not charging
message: before me the u7000 was modified. I changed it to be sure. I tried with 3 different batteries. The green light does not turn orange. The device turns on but does not charge. where should i start

title: 820-2936b It's not charging
message:
Did you try disconnecting BIL (J6955)?
Check diode mode to ground at SCL/SDA lines of battery bus.

title: 820-2936b It's not charging
message:
Did you try disconnecting BIL (J6955)?   YES
SCL : 0.513
SDA: 0.512

title: 820-2936b It's not charging
message:
PPVBAT_G3H_CHGR_R   &  PPVBAT_G3H_CONN : 10.54 voltage
CHGR_LGATE :. No voltage  is this normal ?

title: 820-2936b It's not charging
message:
The battery is recognized in macOS, at least?
Exact PPBUS_G3H voltage, without battery?

title: 820-2936b It's not charging
message:
There is a charging sign but the battery is not charging.
without battery  PPBUS_G3H : 4 voltage

title: 820-2936b It's not charging
message:
So the machine doesn't work without battery?

Remove the battery and fix PPB_G3H problem first.
Check resistance between pins 17/18 and 27/28 of U7000.
